resources.string: Only the most broken people can be great leaders
These scars we have make us who we are we are not meant to go back and fix them
Don\'t let someone who has nothing tell you how to do anything
UNITY ISN’T ABOUT BEING THE SAME. IT’S ABOUT WORKING TOGETHER
A wise king never seek out for war but he must always be ready for it
Patience in a time of anger saves you hundred moments of regrets
We only come to know the true power of evil when we work to suppress it in ourselves
Sometimes you cannot see what you are learning until you come out the other side
Teaching is a lot more than just doing something and expecting you to follow
One of the best lessons you can learn in life is to master how to remain calm
A single individual who has right heart and the right mind that is consumed by a single purpose.. That one man can win the war
